nl.ru.bcigames.StandardizedInterface

Class StandardizedInterface.StimuliSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.ru.bcigames.StandardizedInterface.StandardizedInterface.StimuliSystem
  • Enclosing class:
    StandardizedInterface

    public static class StandardizedInterface.StimuliSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Here the stimuli system in the game can ask for the state of each of the n stimuli. WORK IN PROGRESS.

      • getStimuliStates

        public boolean[] getStimuliStates()
        The game can continuously call this method to ask for the current stimuli active. When it changes, the new stimulus sequence gets send to the server together with the timing the change was registered by the game.
        Returns:
        boolean array.

      • sendStimUpdateToServer

        public void sendStimUpdateToServer(boolean[] stimulusStates)
        Use this function to send the stimulus states with the correct timing to the server.

        stimulusStates -

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns whether the stimulus thread is still running
        Returns:
        true if it is running

      • getElapsedTime

        public long getElapsedTime()
        Time since the start of the simulus system. Gives an independent timing to send to the server when the stimulus got drawn.
        Returns:
        long time in ms since the start of the stimulus thread

      • getCurrentStimulusPosition

        public int getCurrentStimulusPosition()
        Stimulus currently active. Can be used to keep track of the change of the position in the stimulus system.
        Returns:
